description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bjicr","text":"This protocol describes how to determine DNA damage in the adult drosophila brain using the comet assay","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bbmc2","text":"Prepare a Lysis solution for one slide by mixing   of lysis buffer (Trevigen Comet Assay Reagent Kit) and   of DMSO","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":106,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6f9j8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"447ac","text":"Melt LMAgarose in a boiling water bath, aliquot to 1.5ml tubes, and place at  until use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rilh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7lk2r","text":"Dissect 2 adult fly brains per the desired genotype in ice-cold PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cn15a","text":"Combine head homogenate with     agarose and immediately pipette  onto Comet Slide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"638s1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"75","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24dn9","text":"Immerse slides in prechilled Lysis Solution   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43dkr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ga4k","text":" Immerse in a freshly prepared alkaline solution (prepare  l by mixing   NaOH and   of 200mM EDTA in dH2O). pH\u003e13 for   at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":118,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":123,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2101v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"in the dark","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"420ju","text":"Drain excess buffer and wash in 1X TAE twice for   each","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f80dd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avu0o","text":"Run for   at 23V/6mA in TAE_one volt per cm electrode to the electrode","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dpri6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rca4","text":"Drain excess buffer and rinse in dH2O    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":35,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2gnq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7cik","text":"Immerse slides in 70% Ethanol for   and then air-dry slides  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fckm5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ldg4","text":"The next day, prepare SYBR Green (Thermofisher) dilutant by mixing   in   of TE buffer (10 mM Tris-HCL pH 7.5, 1 mM EDTA in dH2O) and place   on each circle of the comet assay slide for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":126,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":140,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":186,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dqopl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"in the dark","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5jf1","text":"Drain excess buffer and mount slides without DAPI in permount (Fisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"346o5","text":" After mounting and drying the slides, take images with 20X objective of the epifluorescence microscope and analyze the comet tails using the Image J Comet assay plugin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
